step_data.thought: I am currently on the 'Credit Memos' tab, which displays the refunded items associated with order #000000002. There is a record showing a refunded item with details such as the credit memo number, created date, order number, order date, bill-to name, status, refunded amount, and an action link to view more details. I will click on the 'View' link for the refunded item to access its details.
